page.topic: Testing if a New Record Was Created
page.description: If you want conditionally run a script only when a new record was created, you can place this code in the CanSaveRecord event of the form.

section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() if (tbl.mode_get()= 1) then ' you are in change mode = existing record else if (tbl.mode_get()= 2 ) then ' you are in enter mode = new record else ' This is neither a change or enter event end if end if
